name: ＠ライブドアブログ lite (スマートフォン/タブレット)
description: ライブドアブログのスマホ用ページ軽量化
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("blog.livedoor.jp"), domain("doorblog.jp"), domain("ldblog.jp"), domain("dreamlog.jp"), domain("publog.jp"), domain("livedoor.biz"), domain("diary.to"), domain("weblog.to"), domain("bloggeek.jp"), domain("blogism.jp"), domain("blogo.jp"), domain("blogstation.jp"), domain("blogto.jp"), domain("gger.jp"), domain("golog.jp"), domain("liblo.jp"), domain("myjournal.jp"), domain("mynikki.jp"), domain("xxxblog.jp"), domain("youblog.jp"), domain("2chblog.jp"), domain("blog.jp"), domain("teamblog.jp"), domain("corpblog.jp"), domain("officeblog.jp"), domain("storeblog.jp"), domain("cafeblog.jp"), domain("officialblog.jp"), domain("techblog.jp"), domain("comment.blogcms.jp"), regexp(".*\\.(jp|com|net|org|info|biz|name)/archives/[0-9]{4,16}\\.html.*"), regexp(".*\\.(jp|com|net|org|info|biz|name)/archives/[0-9]{4,16}"), regexp(".*/lite/archives/[0-9]{4,16}\\.html.*"), regexp(".*/lite/archives/[0-9]{4,16}/comments/[0-9]{1,16}/.*"), regexp(".*/lite/article/[0-9]{4,16}/image/[0-9]{1,16}") {
  div.blogreader-link,
  div#article-clap,
  div#category_ranking,
  div#pbp_ranking,
  div#blog_news,
  div#attention_ranking,
  div#recommend_by_genre,
  div#instagram_blogger,
  div#blog_ranking,
  div#matome_category,
  div[id*="ldblog_related_articles_"],
  div.blogreader-link.blogreader-link-none.box-border,
  aside.section-box,
  div.footer-external-links.footer-box,
  aside.footer-blog-banner.footer-box,
  div.footer-bottom,
  div.snsshare-ttl,
  div.snsshare,
  a.follow_box,
  div#e-likebox,

/* Individual */
  a[title="Amazon"] img.pict,
  div[class*="amazlet"],
  div[class*="amaquick"],
  a[href*="www.dlsite.com"],
  div.amazon.LargeImage,
  table[style=" border-style: none; width:300px;"][cellspacing="0"][cellpadding="0"][border="0"] tbody tr[style="border-style:none;"],
  div#ld-floating-menu,
  img[src*="amazon-adsystem.com"],
  a[href*="linkCode="],
  div.amachazl-box,
  ul.related,
  div.__uz__widget,
  div#_popIn_recommend,
  div.gn_inline_exp,
  span[id*=banner-]
  {
    display: none !important;
  }
}

@-moz-document regexp(".*/lite/archives/[0-9]{4,16}/comments/[0-9]{1,16}/.*") {
/* Comments */
  aside.section-box
  {
    display: inline !important;
  }
}
